TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ValidateValueCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ValidateValueCallback(value As Object) As Boolean
type ValidateValueCallback = delegate of obj -> bool

summary.span: 表示用作验证依赖属性有效值的回调的方法。

span.span: Represents a method used as a callback that validates the effective value of a dependency property.

returns.span: 如果该值通过了验证，则为 ；如果提交的值无效，则为 。

span.span: if the value was validated; if the submitted value was invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用特定签名的基于此委托的回叫和相关方法，如和只读的等效项。Callbacks based on this delegate are used by certain signatures of and related methods, such as and read-only equivalents. 应使用签名`validateValueCallback`参数，如果想要设置其有效每次属性值的特定验证。You should use signatures that take the `validateValueCallback` parameter if you want specific validation of the property value each time that its effective is set. 然后应实现此回调，以便执行实际验证建议的值。You should then implement this callback such that it performs the actual validation of the proposed value. 应返回回调`true`提交给该回调的值是否有效，和`false`否则为。The callback should return `true` if the value submitted to the callback is valid, and `false` otherwise. 一个`false`值将产生异常的尝试无效的属性集，属性系统的特定部分中，因此你的应用程序应准备好处理这些异常。A `false` value will produce an exception in the specific portion of the property system where the invalid property set was attempted, so your application should be prepared to handle these exceptions. 验证回叫存储在依赖项属性标识符，而不是依赖属性元数据。Validation callbacks are stored on dependency property identifiers, rather than dependency property metadata. 验证回叫不能访问到的特定实例上属性的设置，并且只会影响属性一般情况下接受哪些值。Your validation callback does not have access to a specific instance of a on which the property is set, and can only influence what values are accepted for the property in general. 如果需要回调，可以更改属性值基于特定实例，则应使用的组合和回调应用到您的属性的属性元数据。If you need a callback that can change property values based on a specific instance, you should use a combination of a and callbacks as applied to the property metadata of your property. 也可能会影响有关属性的值的相关属性来应用这些回调。You might also apply these callbacks to related properties that should influence your property's value. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性回调和验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。For details, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md). ## Examples 下面的示例包括用于验证自定义依赖项属性的值的一组此回调的实现。The following example includes an implementation of this callback to validate a range of values for a custom dependency property. 在这种情况下的属性值需要一个枚举，并验证可确保提供的值计算结果为该枚举的成员。In this case the property value expects an enumeration, and the validation assures that the provided value evaluates to a member of that enumeration. [!code-csharp[DPCustom#ValidateValueCallback](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCustom/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#validatevaluecallback)] [!code-vb[DPCustom#ValidateValueCallback](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCustom/visualbasic/default.xaml.vb#validatevaluecallback)]
